properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued January 17 at 1:38PM EST until January 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lakeshore flooding possible.

* WHERE...Lake Erie shore of Erie and Chautauqua counties.

* WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong southwest winds may result in a rapid rise in
water levels. Flooding along the shoreline is possible,
especially in bays and inlets and other low lying shoreline
areas. Water may spray across Route 5 in Hamburg.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
